room_title: Escape room "School of Magic" by No Escape Room in Chicago
room_address: 1501 W Dundee Rd Suite 103 Buffalo Grove, IL 60089
room_description:
The gift of immortality for many centuries has been the subject of research and aspirations of gifted wizards. But this gift can turn into a curse if it falls into the wrong hands. Order of the Serpent managed to restore the secret of Alchemist Stone and the Dark.
The wise and brave students are now the only hope for the School of Magic. The conspirators will return in just an hour â€“ will you dare to take the risk and escape in time with the Alchemist Stone?
